sentences.sContent: Such initiatives require leadership, learning by doing and the ability to think and plan in an integrative manner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such initiatives require leadership, learning by doing and the ability to think and plan in an integrative manner.
sentences.sCn: 这样的措施需要领导能力、边学边做、思考的能力和一个综合性的计划方式。

sentences.sContent: While this integrative view of stress probably seems obvious to the average thinking person, it’s taken basic scientists fifty years to reach the same conclusion.
sentences.sContent_eng: While this integrative view of stress probably seems obvious to the average thinking person, it’s taken basic scientists fifty years to reach the same conclusion.
sentences.sCn: 尽管这种综合观点可能显而易见地符合普通人的想法，但基础科学家得要花五十年时间去得到同样的结果。

words.tran: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
[自] 积分器；[电子] 积分电路；整合之人
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和
